org.apache.river.test.impl.end2end.e2etest

Interface TestClient


  • public interface TestClient
    An interface which advertises client methods of interest to other classes, primarily implementations of UserInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeTests()
      Request execution of tests, ignored if tests are currently executing.
      net.jini.core.constraint.InvocationConstraints getCombinedConstraints()
      Get the combined constraints which are associated with the remote call in progress.
      int getFailureCount()
      Get the number of test failures encountered thus far.
      org.apache.river.test.impl.end2end.e2etest.Logger getLogger()
      Get the logger for this client.
      int getTestNumber()
      Get the number of the currently executing test
      int getTestTotal()
      Get the total number of tests to be run.
      SmartInterface getUnconstrainedProxy()
      Obtain the service proxy without constraints applied
      void logFailure(String message)
      Log a failure, using the given message
      void logFailure(String message, Throwable t)
      Log a failure, using the given message and exception in the log output.
      void registerUserInterface(UserInterface ui)
      Register a UserInterface.

    • Method Detail

      • registerUserInterface

        void registerUserInterface(UserInterface ui)
        Register a UserInterface. Only one user interface may be registered at a time.
        Parameters:
        ui - the UserInterface to register, which may be null.

      • executeTests

        void executeTests()
        Request execution of tests, ignored if tests are currently executing.

      • getTestNumber

        int getTestNumber()
        Get the number of the currently executing test
        Returns:
        the test number

      • getTestTotal

        int getTestTotal()
        Get the total number of tests to be run.
        Returns:
        the total number of tests in the test suite

      • getLogger

        org.apache.river.test.impl.end2end.e2etest.Logger getLogger()
        Get the logger for this client.
        Returns:
        the logger instance

      • logFailure

        void logFailure(String message)
        Log a failure, using the given message
        Parameters:
        message - the failure message

      • logFailure

        void logFailure(String message,
                Throwable t)
        Log a failure, using the given message and exception in the log output.
        Parameters:
        message - the failure message
        t - the exception causing the failure

      • getFailureCount

        int getFailureCount()
        Get the number of test failures encountered thus far.
        Returns:
        the failure count

      • getUnconstrainedProxy

        SmartInterface getUnconstrainedProxy()
        Obtain the service proxy without constraints applied
        Returns:
        the unconstrained service proxy

      • getCombinedConstraints

        net.jini.core.constraint.InvocationConstraints getCombinedConstraints()
        Get the combined constraints which are associated with the remote call in progress. If no remote call is in progress, this method may return null.
